original: Hallberg, Per Johan, direktör, Halmstad, f. 8/5/79 i Halmstad av lä-rov:adj. Per H. o. Hortense Wret-lind. G. 05 m. Maria Simons son. Barn: Marie-Louise f. 08, fil. kand., Anna-Margret 12, jur. kand., Birgitta 23, d. 44. — Init-.tag. t. samt ordf. o. verkst. dir. i A-B Tylösands Havsbad, verkst. dir. i Halmstads kredit-fören. Ordf. i verkst. utsk. f. Halm-stadsutstäliln. 29, i Hall. hantv:- o. småind idistr. 25-46, i Tylösands elektr :’fören(., Tylösands Havsbad o. Halmstads kreditfören., v. ordf. i Sv:es hantv:- o. småind :org. 35-45 o. i s. krets, av Sv. fotograf, förb., rev. i Hypoteksfören. f. västkustens städer, led. av styr. f. Hall. boistadskre-ditfören., fuiUm. i Brandförsäkr. A-B Switiod, fd. led. av stadsfullm., drät-selkamm., fattigv :styr., hamn- o. foilk-sk:styr. RVO, ProPatrstGM, Sv. hantv :org. förtj :M.
translated:
Hallberg, Per Johan, director, Halmstad, born May 8, 1879 in Halmstad to teacher and adjunct Per H. and Hortense Wretlind. Married in 1905 to Maria Simons son. Children: Marie-Louise born in 1908, Bachelor of Philosophy, Anna-Margret born in 1912, Bachelor of Law, Birgitta born in 1923, died 1944. 

Career: founder and chairman and managing director of A-B Tylösands Havsbad, managing director of Halmstad credit association. Chairman in executive committee of Halmstadsutstäliln 1929, in Hall's trade and small-scale industry 1925-46, in Tylösands elektr: association, Tylösands Havsbad and Halmstad credit society, vice-chairman of Sweden's trade and small industry organization 1935-45 and in the Swedish photographers association. Reviewer in the Mortgage Association for West Coast Cities, member of the board of Halland's housing credit association, trustee in Brandförsäkr. A-B Switiod, former member of the city council, board of assessment and relief, port and public school board. RVO (Knight of the Order of Vasa), ProPatrstGM (Knight of the Order of the Polar Star), Swedish Trade Organization Merit.
